code: import{getHeaderMini,getInfo}from"../util/City";import UpdateCityInfo from"./UpdateCityInfo";import ErrorCity from"./CityErrored";export default function(name){return fetch("https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?appid=2e19bb27bd5e717bac388dc0c1827b17&q=".concat(name)).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){throw Error(response.statusText);}return response;}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(response){return UpdateCityInfo(name,getHeaderMini(response),getInfo(response));}).catch(function(err){return ErrorCity(name);});}
